name: Split (itch) (Vmod, Meryem, Sco, azertfx, akamli, Soguma, staare)
name_original: Split (itch) (Vmod, Meryem, Sco, azertfx, akamli, Soguma, staare)
description:
The game is about unstable change of elements in the playable-character. his objective is to restore is original form.


Controls :
Move with WSAD or arrows.
Attack with mouse.

Elements change every few seconds.
